featured.text: He then moved to New York City, where he worked as a freelance illustrator with Harper’s Weekly, a popular magazine of the time, and began painting.

definition.zh_def: 自由職業者，指不受僱於特定雇主，根據合同或項目提供服務的人。
definition.en_def: A person who works independently, providing services to multiple clients without long-term commitments to any employer.
definition.example: She decided to freelance as a graphic designer to have more flexibility in her work schedule.
